name: Web-Based Internet Laboratory Management System /subject/controller.php文件SQL注入漏洞
product: ["Web-Based Internet Laboratory Management System Web-Based Internet Laboratory Management System 1.0"]
description: Web-Based Internet Laboratory Management System是一个网络实验室软件。Web-Based Internet Laboratory Management System存在SQL注入漏洞，该漏洞源于文件/subject/controller.php缺少对外部输入SQL语句的验证。攻击者可利用该漏洞执行非法SQL命令窃取数据库敏感数据。
solution:
目前厂商尚未发布升级程序修复该安全问题，详情见厂商官网：
https://itsourcecode.com/
